title: Multiscale correlative imaging reveals sequential and heterogeneous degradations in fast-charging batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01497A, Paper
Dechao Meng, Zhichen Xue, Guokang Chen, Dengke Zhou, Yu-Shi He, Zi-Feng Ma, Yijin Liu, Linsen Li
In this work, we developed lengthscale-bridging, multimodal SEM-Raman-NanoSIMs techniques to understand the complex chemical–structural–mechanical interplays within fast-charging batteries and revealed sequential and heterogeneous degradations.
